# Humble request for all Collaborators: 

-  1. Don't push or commit directly to the main branch
-  2. Always test the code locally first
-  3. Please check after pushing, don't break existing functionality
-  4. Githuh issues or Discussions could be used to suggest ideas or report bugs.
-  5. **Last more important**, All upper rules are nonsense, Do whatever you want in this repo ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. We are all learners btw.
 

 ## Repo Policy
  - This repo will be private by deafault so only team member can see the all source code, changes or commits.
  - If any team member needed, we will do it public for limited period of time.
  - For doing the repo public, **Captain / Vice-Captain permission is required with proof**
